review: It is much more than our expectations.We have got a great deal of enjoyment out of it. We would recomend it .  John and Bonnie Carter
author: John Carter

review: The Fire TV Stick is  a nice small piece of equipment that allows access to other forms of entertainment from you TV. I'm happy with the performance of the stick and it allows us more choices in our TV watching.
author: K. Williams "K. Williams"
